parameters.message: "Okay, I think what you did was self-defense. But I think I would've done it differently."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Oh, believe me, I wanted to do it differently. He was supposed to die."
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: "You are giving me the creeps. But it's okay."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "We have to accept the people we like not as who they are, but as whoever they become."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "I'm okay with either version: clumsy or killer ninja."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Don't anyone or I will kill you."
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: She stares at me with a serious face.
"Hahahaha I SHOULD'VE TAKEN A PICTURE OF YOUR FACE JUST NOW"
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: "So, are you going to teach me to cook the Blowfish or not?"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Yes, eventually. I think the kitchen will be closed for a while because of the accident..."
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: We talked for some time, then each of us went for our rooms.
